requirements.summary: Add a dedicated login page UI with a Bootstrap-styled form for email/password and a primary Log in submit button.
acceptanceCriteria: Login page renders a form with an email input, password input, and a submit button
Inputs use appropriate HTML input types (email/password)

file_operations.description: Create the LoginPage React view containing a Bootstrap-styled form with Email (type=email), Password (type=password), and a prominent primary action submit button labeled “Log in”, using Bootstrap form and spacing utilities.
Create the App component that renders the dedicated LoginPage as the app’s main view so it is reachable from the existing React entry point (without changing frontend/src/main.tsx).

requirements.summary: Ensure Bootstrap is included so the login page renders with Bootstrap styling at runtime without manual user CSS setup.
acceptanceCriteria: Bootstrap CSS is loaded in the app at runtime
Login page styling visibly reflects Bootstrap defaults (e.g., form controls/buttons spacing and appearance)

file_operations.description: Include Bootstrap CSS via a runtime-loaded mechanism (e.g., a CDN stylesheet link in the document head) so Bootstrap styles apply automatically to the LoginPage without any user setup.

requirements.summary: Apply a warm neutral theme and centered card layout that complements Bootstrap and avoids blue/purple-dominant colors.
acceptanceCriteria: Login form is centered on the page and presented in a card-like container
The page uses a warm neutral background and consistent spacing/typography
No blue/purple-dominant theme colors are used

file_operations.description: Create global styles to complement Bootstrap with a warm neutral background, consistent typography, and spacing defaults; ensure any custom accents avoid blue/purple-dominant colors.
Adjust LoginPage layout to be centered (full-height) with a card-like container and warm neutral accents (e.g., neutral/dark/earthy button styling rather than default blue 'primary').
